short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alphagate integrated with X, enhancing the overall user experience with advanced features and superior functionality.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tools helps X users have integrated Alphagate on their surfing experience. It displays Alphagate data such as account history, followers/followings and social links to assist users by providing safety and insights.
